column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I wanted to get a knitting book for one pattern , but did n't want to buy the entire book just to access three of its pages .
#text=I decided to go see if they had it at the library .
#text=When I got there , I walked through the automatic doors and breathed the smell of old paper .
#text=I walked over to a computer to look up the title I was seeking and jotted down the area in which it could be found .
#text=Luckily , it had n't been checked out and I meandered over to the nonfiction section .
#text=I quickly found the book and took some time perusing the selection .
#text=I did n't see anything else that perked my interest and walked to the front to check out the book .
#text=I decided to use the self check out .
#text=I scanned my library card and then the bar code on the book .
#text=I took that and the book , then left .
